scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/desktop/fullstack/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ~/desktop/fullstack/part3/phonebookbackend && cd ~/desktop/fullstack/part3/phonebookbackend
scripts.deploy2: cd ~/desktop/fullstack && git subtree push --prefix part3 heroku-phonebook master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy2
